page.title: 03Hadley Park Lock
page.content:
Hadley Park Lock was used for little boats which carried{coal.}It was built about 200 years ago but it is not used anymore.All the gates are rotting and also there is not enough water for the boats.The lock has three gates and over the top were big winches for pulling up the gates. While we were there we met an old man who said he could remember the boats going up and down the canal.The canal was last used in 1944.
{G.K.N. Sankeys}is a factory situated to the north of Hadley centre.It covers a large area of land.The factory makes army vehicles like tanks and trucks and spare parts for these vehicles.G.K.N.Sankeys employs a lot of people between the ages of 25 and 65 years.
